data.Name: Enervee
data.Tagline: Nudging the world to shop efficient. Our Choice Engines help millions of utility customers choose the right thing.
data.About: The world's first energy efficiency commerce platform. Enervee connects retailers, manufacturers, governments and utilities through an integrated product recommendation platform that is distributed via online, in-store, mobile and social channels. The Enervee® Score provides a universal way of comparing a product’s energy efficiency, based on industry standards, against all models available on the market. Through its global data platform, Enervee provides the most up-to-date information to help inform energy-smart decisions.
